text: Faltәye hal kaduwube bәlin kәlzәgәna, kuru karnoye samno hal njirgatadәn cutulowo.
translated_text:
Yerwa Kanuri: Turkey kəmabugube shiga dəriyizə kəlzəna nashanzə yakkəson: kəmodugu Aegeanbedo futeyaan dawunadəa, kəmadugu Blackbedo nasha yalaben dawuna kuru kəmoduwu Mediterraneando nasha anəmgaben dawuna. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Yerwa Kanuri: Badiram kəriwudəben nguwuso kəla njiben balarozayin, daji allan awodo cintən awolaa asutəbe cado kuru isə nguwugano, Submarine sodən sədiya njiben cidatə mbujaga, sawu wande cintən shiga turənyiro. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Yerwa Kanuri: Faltәye hal kaduwube bәlin kәlzәgәna, kuru karnoye samno hal njirgatadәn cutulowo. 
English: The first time they were attacked by the Germans they were forced to hide in the caves.

Yerwa Kanuri: Kəmodugu Aegeanbedo futeyaan dawunadəa, kəmodugu Blackbedo nasha yalaben dawuna kuru kəmoduwu Mediterraneando nasha anəmgaben dawuna. 
English: The Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south
clean_output: The first time they were attacked by the Germans they were forced to hide in the caves.

English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Yerwa Kanuri: Awo adǝa sandiye kǝndowada sau poto diye allo fǝletǝram dǝa mbǝro nankaro, kuru awo shima dǝa allo fǝletǝram dǝa kotəma lan bowotin. 
English: The first time I saw a submarine was when I was a child, I was standing on the beach and saw a submarine coming towards us.

Yerwa Kanuri: Awo adǝa sandiye kǝndowada sau poto diye allo fǝletǝram dǝa mbǝro nankaro, kuru awo shima dǝa allo fǝletǝram dǝa kotəma lan bowotin.

Yerwa Kanuri: Turkey kəmabugube shiga dəriyizə kəlzəna nashanzə yakkəson: kəmodugu Aegeanbedo futeyaan dawunadəa, kəmadugu Blackbedo nasha yalaben dawuna kuru kəmoduwu Mediterraneando nasha anəmgaben dawuna. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Yerwa Kanuri: Badiram kəriwudəben nguwuso kəla njiben balarozayin, daji allan awodo cintən awolaa asutəbe cado kuru isə nguwugano, Submarine sodən sədiya njiben cidatə mbujaga, sawu wande cintən shiga turənyiro. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Yerwa Kanuri: Awowa nguwu nyiye namnǝm kururo sandǝna kawu bulawuro diminna sa bulawurodǝro lenǝminna lan. 
English: The war was a long one, and the submarines were forced to stay under the water for a long time.

Yerwa Kanuri: Awowa turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro, turənyiro
clean_output: The war was a long one, and the submarines were forced to stay under the water for a long time.

English: “We have four submarines, and they are all in the sea, but we have to keep them in the sea because they are not in the land.”

Yerwa Kanuri: “Shwurǝ be diye sandiya zǝamzǝna ma, ammaa kǝrma sandiya kolzǝna," sǝ gullono.
